kernel

Class SimulatorProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • kernel.AbstractKernelComponent
      • kernel.SimulatorProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KernelComponent

    public class SimulatorProxy
extends AbstractKernelComponent
    This class is the kernel interface to a simulator.

    • Method Detail

      • getUpdates

        public ChangeSet getUpdates(int time)
                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Get updates from this simulator. This method may block until updates are available.
        Parameters:
        time - The timestep to get updates for.
        Returns:
        A ChangeSet representing the updates from this simulator.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If this thread is interrupted while waiting for updates.

      • sendUpdate

        public void sendUpdate(int time,
              ChangeSet update)
        Send an update message to this simulator.
        Parameters:
        time - The simulation time.
        update - The updated entities.

      • sendAgentCommands

        public void sendAgentCommands(int time,
                     java.util.Collection<? extends Command> commands)
        Send a set of agent commands to this simulator.
        Parameters:
        time - The current time.
        commands - The agent commands to send.
